title: HOUR 1- David Pollack Oct 15, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- David Pollack Oct 15, 2020
description:
David Pollack tells Dan that with this Covid19 season; there should be an 8 team playoff. David says that the loss of Nick Saban on the side line for Alabama is a huge loss. David says the search in the building for Nick Saban should start now, because David says there is no way Nick Saban will not be around some where.

content:encoded:
David Pollack tells Dan that with this Covid19 season; there should be an 8 team playoff. David says that the loss of Nick Saban on the side line for Alabama is a huge loss. David says the search in the building for Nick Saban should start now, because David says there is no way Nick Saban will not be around some where.
